mapper.insert: insert into qna values (#{qa_no}, #{qa_subject}, #{qa_content}, null, sysdate, '답변대기', #{qa_ref}, #{qa_refStep}, #{qa_refLevel}, 'n', #{m_email})
mapper.select: select count(*) from qna where qa_ref in (select qa_ref from qna where M_email=#{m_email}) and qa_del='n'
mapper.update: update qna set qa_del='y' where qa_ref=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from(select b.*, @rownum:=@rownum+1 rn from qna b, (select @rownum:=0) as tmp order by QA_no desc) as boardlist where rn between 1 and 20
